snippet: N.F.L. players live longer than men in the general population, according to a study commissioned by the players union and sent by the league Tuesday to men who played in the N.F.L. before 1993.
abstract: NFL is touting a study commissioned by the players union finding that NFL players live longer than men in the general population; results come amid debate over head injuries and safety in football.
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. players live longer than men in the general population, according to a study commissioned by the players union and sent by the league Tuesday to men who played in the N.F.L. before 1993.

headline.seo: N.F.L. Players Live Longer Than Men in General Population, Study Says
headline.main: N.F.L. Players Live Longer Than Other Men, Study Says
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. Players Live Longer Than Other Men, Study Says

keywords.value: National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health
keywords.name: organizations
